name: Super mover brothers: The motion picture
name_original: Super mover brothers: The motion picture
description: You work for an outrageous movers company that willing to move anything for cheap, no matter how ridiculous the items it is. You by yourself, or with a teammates must push and pull as many items into the house before the times is up. Afterward you can compare your cash to others people cash to see which team or single person did the best. WASD to move and hold the Enter key to drag object. If you are using an Xbox controller then you can move with the Joystick and hold down A to drag object.
